title: Man Running

adjectives: (of fluids) moving or issuing in a stream
Moving or issuing in a stream.
Of advancing the ball by running
(of e.g. a machine) performing or capable of performing
Of a horse, having a running gait; not a trotter or pacer.
verbs: Move fast by using one's feet, with one foot off the ground at any given time
To move quickly by alternately making a short jump off of either foot.
To move forward quickly upon two feet by alternately making a short jump off either foot.
To drive fast; to step on the accelerator.
nouns: Sexual maturity is the age or stage when an organism can reproduce.
The age or stage when an organism can reproduce
A man is a male human.
An adult human member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
A human member of the masculine sex or gender.
An adult person who is male (as opposed to a woman)
Competition where the goal is to complete the course as fast as possible
The sport of competing in races.
The sport of engaging in contests of speed
In sport, racing is a competition of speed, against an objective criterion, usually a clock or to a specific point.

apple_vendor_description: The man running emoji on Apple devices portrays dynamic motion with a sense of athletic vigor. His figure is rendered with smooth gradients and soft rounded edges, appearing to stride forward with determination. The realistic lighting emphasizes the musculature and the flow of his clothing, suggesting speed and energy. This emoji is commonly used to represent exercise, active pursuits, or a need to hurry, embodying the spirit of movement with Apple's characteristic polished aesthetic.
